blogs.title: Finding a city
blogs.content: Think of London, a small city, it's dark, dark in the daytime, the people sleep, sleep in the daytime if they want to.
blogs.author: David

blogs.title: French
blogs.content: Ce que j'ai fais, ce soir la, ce qu'elle a dit, ce soir la, realisant mon espoir, je me lance, vers la gloire, OK.
blogs.author: Tina

blogs.title: Don't worry
blogs.content: I see the clouds that move across the sky, I see the wind that moves the clouds away, it moves the clouds over by the building, I pick the building that I want to live in.
blogs.author: David

blogs.title: I Zimbra
blogs.content: Gadji beri bimba clandridi, lauli lonni cadori gadjam, A bim beri glassala glandride, E glassala tuffm I zimbra.
blogs.author: David
